textBox.richText: Earlier this morning after logging onto my precious MacBook™, I perform my usual routine. Part of this includes checking my Mail, which I do, and I see that Nicole (who now is large and in charge of this here blog) has some new blog posts in my RSS feed—hooray! I proceed to read them, ending on the most recent one being titled: I HAD A DREAM I WAS OBESE, among other, many, posts of obscure pictures that at the time did not seem strange to be posted on Nicole’s blog. (I was still reeling from the intense Snowventure of this morning, freeing our driveway from the chilling grip of the recent Snowpocalypse, so forgive my misjudgment.) So, I see she is online as well, i.e., on AOL Instant Messenger (iChat for me cause Macs rox my sox) and I decide to playfully initiate the conversation based upon the aforementioned blog post: Me so how's that whole being obese thing going for you? Nicole ive been obese since age 9, its not going well xD Me lolol; I can't say that I've ever had a dream where my body size had become overexcessivly large before what's that even like? are you imagining (aka dreaming) that and you are all ABDHEJFJD Nicole well both my parents struggle with weight so i do everything in my power not to Me well I really don't think that's an issue you have to worry about Nicole considering i hardly eat, nope xD im just not a hungry person Me but food tastes good! Nicole i know And then we continued to discuss matters pertaining to food, The Universe, and giving ProTips. The conversation seemed to start off just fine with us jokingly discussing the absurdly made post about having fat dreams. Nothing seemed out of the ordinary, nothing at all. Much later in the day, after night had fallen over the softly fallen snow of early morn, we started discussing blogs. Me being the flashy showoff that I am , I sent Nicole a screenshot of my Mail’s RSS feed and how I was able to read her blog posts through there. After viewing the image, she exclaimed in a capslock-fuled fury: Nicole WHAT THATS NOT MY BLOG LMAO to which I replied: Me it's the RSS version!1! […] Me whereupon I can read The Entries Oh how blissfully unaware I was. And this proceeded to happen: Me but w8 where is the other posts?! the "obese dream" one? Nicole dude on tumblr you can change your urls so i changed mine and youve been subscribed to the new person who took my url Me WHAT Nicole YOUVE BEEN STALKING THIS GIRL WHOSE NAME IS GABRIELLA Me WOAH WOAH […] Me MIND BLOWN; I HAD NO IDEA Nicole HAHAHAHAHA DID YOU REALIZE THATS NOT WHAT I NORMALLY TALK ABOUT Me so the obese dream wasn't you?!?!?! Nicole WHAT OBESE DREAM Me OH FUCK NEEDLESS TO SAY, I felt like The Noob. Luckily this all went down “so well” too! Nicole could have very well been all “GTFO” at me first thing in the morning, leaving me very confused! It is a good thing no angrystrife arose due to this (despite my relentless “OMG I AM SO SORRY”s and “SHITSHITHISHITHISHITHISTHIOMGSHIT”s) But now after all is said and done, we both now have quite the hi-larious story to tell! …Which is exactly what I am doing right now! Oh yeah, and she is also never going to let me live this down. As can be seen here. Among all the other, um, incidents that happened during today’s conversation. fffffuuuuuu–
